sys_element_mapping.value:
request={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.request}}^request_item={{Service Catalog_1.request_item}}^short_description=Add AD Groups for AX - Access Request - {{06e528b9-1451-4e54-8e77-d19f4d067413.requested_for.name}}^description=The AX user needs to be added to several active directory user groups in Manage Engine at: https://manage.apigroupinc.com:8443/#/dashboard: - CTX-CitrixRemote - Gives user access to Citrix - CTX-APi Insight-Prod - Adds the AX Prod app to their Citrix screen - If the user is being setup in another environment such as UAT, Support, etc, they will need to be added to the approriate citrix group (ie. CTX-APi Insight-UAT) - SEC-AXDall – Security group for login access and reports - INSGT-####-Alldocs – Gives users access to attachments in AX for the specified company. - *#### = Company# and name ie. INSGT-1025-VAS-Alldocs - If the user has security access to more than one company (or all companies), they will need to be added to each company's Alldocs group
Note: Manage Engine takes approximately 15 minutes to sync and for the user to see the icons on their Citrix Dashboard.^assignment_group={"display":"AG_EnterpriseApplicationsSupportTeam","value":"48b385421be35090e7004229bc4bcb14"}

request={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.request}}^request_item={{Service Catalog_1.request_item}}^short_description=AX.SEC02 Provision AX Access - Access Request - {{06e528b9-1451-4e54-8e77-d19f4d067413.requested_for.name}}^description=Setup the new AX user with requested environments, security role(s), and companies. See KB0010361 for complete instructions.^assignment_group={"display":"AG_EnterpriseApplicationsSupportTeam","value":"48b385421be35090e7004229bc4bcb14"}

request={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.request}}^request_item={{Service Catalog_1.request_item}}^short_description=Setup AX User Relationship - Access Request - {{06e528b9-1451-4e54-8e77-d19f4d067413.requested_for.name}}^description=Complete theAX User Relationship. Note, this cannot be completed until Payroll sets up the employee's worker record in AX. See KB0011337 for complete instructions^assignment_group={"display":"AG_EnterpriseApplicationsSupportTeam","value":"48b385421be35090e7004229bc4bcb14"}^state=50

request={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.request}}^request_item={{Service Catalog_1.request_item}}^short_description=Management Reporter Setup - Access Request - {{06e528b9-1451-4e54-8e77-d19f4d067413.requested_for.name}}^description=This user needs additional Management Reporter access setup. fd_data._1__get_catalog_variables.api_company_controller \u003d\u003d \u0027true\u0027 ? needsOr(query) + \u0027dependent_value\u003dapi_company_controller\u0027 : \u0027\u0027;\nquery +\u003d fd_data._1__get_catalog_variables.api_support_elevated \u003d\u003d \u0027true\u0027 ? needsOr(query) + \u0027dependent_value\u003dapi_support_elevated\u0027 : \u0027\u0027;\n\n//Above roles get requested of APi Group,\nif(query \u003d\u003d \u0027name\u003dsc_cat_item_option^element\u003du_single_var_approver^inactive\u003dfalse\u0027){\nquery +\u003d fd_data._1__get_catalog_variables.american_fire_protection_group_inc \u003d\u003d \u0027true\u0027 ? needsOr(query) + \u0027dependent_value\u003damerican_fire_protection_group_inc\u0027 : \u0027\u0027;\nquery +\u003d fd_data._1__get_catalog_variables.unites_states_alliance_fire_protection \u003d\u003d \u0027true\u0027 ? needsOr(query) + \u0027dependent_value\u003dunites_states_alliance_fire_protection\u0027 : \u0027\u0027;\nquery +\u003d fd_data._1__get_catalog_variables.viking_automatic_sprinkler_company \u003d\u003d \u0027true\u0027 ? needsOr(query) + \u0027dependent_value\u003dviking_automatic_sprinkler_company\u0027 : \u0027\u0027;\nquery +\u003d fd_data._1__get_catalog_variables.w_m_sprinkler_nyc_llc \u003d\u003d \u0027true\u0027 ? needsOr(query) + \u0027dependent_value\u003dw_m_sprinkler_nyc_llc\u0027 : \u0027\u0027;\nquery +\u003d fd_data._1__get_catalog_variables.davis_ulmer_sprinkler_co_inc \u003d\u003d \u0027true\u0027 ? needsOr(query) + \u0027dependent_value\u003ddavis_ulmer_sprinkler_co_inc\u0027 : \u0027\u0027;\nquery +\u003d fd_data._1__get_catalog_variables.dat_all_company_data \u003d\u003d \u0027true\u0027 ? needsOr(query) + \u0027dependent_value\u003ddat_all_company_data\u0027 : \u0027\u0027;\nquery +\u003d fd_data._1__get_catalog_variables.international_fire_protection_inc \u003d\u003d \u0027true\u0027 ? needsOr(query) + \u0027dependent_value\u003dinternational_fire_protection_inc\u0027 : \u0027\u0027;\n}\n\nif(query\u003d\u003d\u0027name\u003dsc_cat_item_option^element\u003du_single_var_approver^inactive\u003dfalse\u0027){\n return \u0027name!\u003dsc_cat_item_option^name\u003dsc_cat_item_option\u0027;\n}\nreturn query;\n\nfunction needsOr(x){\n if(x \u003d\u003d \u0027name\u003dsc_cat_item_option^element\u003du_single_var_approver^inactive\u003dfalse\u0027){\n return \u0027^\u0027;\n }\n else{\n return \u0027^OR\u0027;\n Catalog_1.request_item}}^short_description=Add AD Groups for AX - Access Request - {{06e528b9-1451-4e54-8e77-d19f4d067413.requested_for.name}}^description=The AX user needs to be added to several active directory user groups in Manage Engine at: https://manage.apigroupinc.com:8443/#/dashboard: - CTX-CitrixRemote - Gives user access to Citrix - CTX-APi Insight-Prod - Adds the AX Prod app to their Citrix screen - If the user is being setup in another environment such as UAT, Support, etc, they will need to be added to the approriate citrix group (ie. CTX-APi Insight-UAT) - SEC-AXDall – Security group for login access and reports - INSGT-####-Alldocs – Gives users access to attachments in AX for the specified company. - *#### = Company# and name ie. INSGT-1025-VAS-Alldocs - If the user has security access to more than one company (or all companies), they will need to be added to each company's Alldocs group
Note: Manage Engine takes approximately 15 minutes to sync and for the user to see the icons on their Citrix Dashboard.^assignment_group={"display":"AG_EnterpriseApplicationsSupportTeam","value":"48b385421be35090e7004229bc4bcb14"}</value></sys_element_mapping><sys_element_mapping
